p: Ziziphora clinopodioides is a species from the Lamiaceae family which is used traditionally as a flavoring agent in meat products in western regions of Iran (Shavisi et al., 2017). Many researchers have reported that extracted essential oil of this plant owns considerable antioxidant and antimicrobial activities (Gursoy et al., 2009; Ozturk & Ercisli, 2007; Shavisi et al., 2017).
